## Master level courses

### University of Bergen

I am the course leader for three 5 ECTS Master's level courses.

-   [Bio300B](https://www.uib.no/en/course/BIO300B) -- Biostatistics
-   [Bio302](https://www.uib.no/en/course/BIO302) -- Biological data analysis II\
-   [Bio303](https://www.uib.no/en/course/BIO303) -- Ordination and gradient analysis

I also make contributions to

-   [Bio250](https://www.uib.no/en/course/BIO250) -- Palaeoecology. I teach the section on dating and age depth models.

## Rklubben

I host a weekly peer-learning drop-in session for R code (and statistical) problems (Fridays 1400-1600 in [Tunet](https://link.mazemap.com/8DAdjHvl)).

## Teaching resources

![](https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/figures/icons_all.png)

Together with Dr Aud Halbritter, Dr Jonathan Soul√© and others, I wrote [Enough R to write a thesis](https://biostats-r.github.io/).
This is a collection of interactive workbooks and shiny apps to teach the use of [R](https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/workingInR/), [quarto for reproducible documents](https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/quarto/), [git and GitHub for version control](https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/github/), and [R package development](https://biostats-r.github.io/biostats/package/).

These workbooks are used to support regular and special courses.
